name: Heavy Duty (itch) (AcHeHex)
description:
In Heavy Duty you play as Buddy who got himself trapped in an old mine shaft from the past. Using his big muscles, do your best to traverse the rickety and frail old mines.

It is a game made right in my wheelhouse, a puzzle/action platformer with retro graphics made for what I call "the NES Pro". It is short and might be slightly clunky but I'm hoping everything is clear and fun enough that you'll make it to the end. It's not a long game regardless 

⭐⭐⭐Version Differences⭐⭐⭐

  • Jam version has no audio except for 1 very loud beep when you grab crates. I do not recommend playing that version but if you do, please find a way to mute the game window before starting. I'm very sorry
  • Post Jam version is identical to the Jam one gameplay wise, but I have decorated the last 3 levels a little bit more and have added SFX and Music that can be controlled in the options menu. I have opted out of Audio in the Jam, so if you want to play this version keep these changes in mind in the rating. 

⭐⭐⭐Controls⭐⭐⭐

Move with arrows/DPad. Jump with Space or A button, Run with X Key or X button, and grab with C Key or B button. You can pause the game with Enter or Start.

*Direct Input controllers not supported.
**Press up to enter doors.

Music byCodeManu from OpenGameArt.com
Art and Code by AcHe.
